backend/main.mo: Actor defines binder, photocard, and user data types with storage, authorization mixins, and functions for managing binders, cards, profiles, and subscription status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing GoodNotes‑optimized PDF export features, related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file across auth, binder screens, hooks, components, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind and CSS variable definitions for light and dark themes using OKLCH colors and shared utility styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile loading, global layout, and navigation between binder screens.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderFra: UI wrapper rendering the visual binder page with textured background and frame elements.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderPag: Export‑only 12‑card grid renderer that draws photocard images with rarity, condition, glint overlays, and no UI chrome.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderPdf: Dialog for exporting a binder page as a PDF with page size and quality options, handling generation state and errors.
frontend/src/components/binder/BinderRin: Displays a static semi-transparent binder rings image overlay positioned on the left side.
frontend/src/components/binder/PageSwipe: Container enabling swipe gestures and page-flip animations based on navigation direction.
frontend/src/components/layout/AccentCol: Dropdown selector allowing users to choose an accent color theme previewed with small swatches.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, footer, user profile display, accent selector, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/system/GlobalLoa: Gate component showing a loading spinner or error state with retry before rendering app content.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports static deployment build metadata including ID and timestamp.
frontend/src/config/subscription.ts: Provides helpers to read and check configuration of the Shopify upgrade URL from environment variables.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginPanel.ts: Login screen using Internet Identity with accent initialization and a sign‑in button.
frontend/src/features/auth/ProfileSetupM: Modal prompting new users to enter a display name and save their profile.
frontend/src/features/binders/theme.ts: Returns the default binder theme with preset colors, textures, and styles.
frontend/src/features/cards/editedImageC: LocalStorage utilities for saving, retrieving, and clearing edited card images.
frontend/src/features/cards/imageValidat: Validates uploaded card images for allowed file types and max size.
frontend/src/features/cards/overlayAsset: Maps card condition and rarity to sticker and badge asset paths and provides glint overlay logic.
frontend/src/features/editor/stickerTray: Defines sticker metadata and loads sticker images from a sprite sheet for the editor.
frontend/src/features/export/binderPageP: Generates a printable HTML page for exporting a binder page as PDF, resolving images and opening a print window.
frontend/src/features/export/resolveExpo: Converts card image blobs to data URLs and preloads overlay assets for reliable PDF export.
frontend/src/features/export/shareOrDown: Provides logging and filename generation for sharing or saving PDFs via the browser print dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccentColor.ts: Manages accent color selection, persists it in localStorage, and applies CSS variable overrides.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBinderPagination.t: Handles pagination logic for binder cards, exposing current page, navigation, and sliced card lists.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, initialization, and context management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLoadingDiagnostics: Logs delayed loading diagnostics to identify which app step is blocking without exposing sensitive data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wrapper hooks for backend queries and mutations, handling user profile, binders, subscription status, and card actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipeGesture.ts: Provides touch and mouse handlers to detect horizontal swipe gestures with configurable callbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive custom color variables and utility classes for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/screens/AddCardScreen.tsx: UI for adding a new photocard including file validation, preview, upload progress, and submit handling.
frontend/src/screens/BinderLibraryScreen: Displays the user's binders with create/delete actions, subscription limits, error handling, and upgrade prompts.
frontend/src/screens/BinderSettingsScree: Allows customizing a binder's theme including colors, textures, and styles, and saving updates.
frontend/src/screens/BinderViewScreen.ts: Shows a binder's pages with pagination, drag-and-drop card reordering, and export/settings controls.
frontend/src/screens/EditCardScreen.tsx: React screen for editing a card image with stickers on a canvas, handling rendering, selection, dragging, and saving overlays.
Normalizes backend errors into user-friendly messages with special handling for binder limit errors.
frontend/src/utils/promiseTimeout.ts: Provides a helper to wrap any promise with a timeout using Promise.race.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending colors, fonts, shadows, and animations for the binder-themed UI.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features and requirements for GoodNotes‑optimized PDF export and sharing.
